channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Fall 2024 SoE Midterm Student Course Evaluations Now Open
item.description: Date: Thursday, October 10, 2024 (all day) - School of Engineering (SoE) midterm course evaluations are now open for the Fall 2024 semester. Your feedback is very important to the Institute and the school, so please complete the SoE midterm evaluation surveys for all your courses! Evaluations will be available through Wednesday, October 23, 2024.
item.author: Students

item.title: “Wellness Wednesday” Series Continues October 23
item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 23, 2024 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM - A program dedicated to enhancing student health and well-being, Wellness Wednesdays offer a diverse range of activities and information sessions that focus on crucial life skills and aim to equip students with practical knowledge for maintaining physical, mental, and financial wellness throughout their college journey and beyond.
item.author: Students

item.title: Be a Part of RPI’s Premier Cybersecurity Team!
item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 23, 2024 6:00 PM - 7:00 PM - The #1 collegiate cybersecurity CTF team in the country is looking for new players, so if you’d like to be part of the Rensselaer Cybersecurity Collaboratory, just stop by Sage 3101 every Wednesday evening through the end of the semester! No experience necessary, just a willingness to learn and try new things. Contact Dr. Brian Callahan if you have questions.
item.author: Students

item.title: “Discover Beyond the Classroom” Study Abroad Program to be Held October 23
item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 23, 2024 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM - Join the Office of International Programs and the School of Science Advising Hub for an enlightening presentation by the Office of International Programs staff! Attendees will delve into the incredible opportunities awaiting abroad, hear students’ first-hand experiences in a dynamic student panel, and discover how studying abroad can impact one’s academic and personal growth.
item.author: Students

item.title: EMPAC+ to Host Pizza Pre-Show for Rensselaer Students
item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 23, 2024 6:00 PM - Rensselaer students are invited to connect with their friends at the free EMPAC+ pizza pre-show, then join the one-night-only film screening of “An Evening with Bassem Saad and Sanja Grozdanić,” in which the artists will discuss their “cinepoem” collaborations and then show a selection of films they’ve chosen to illuminate their EMPAC-commissioned performance, “Permanent Trespass.”
item.author: Students

item.title: Livestream Viewing of Ketanji Brown Jackson Leadership Presentation to be Held October 22
item.description: Date: Tuesday, October 22, 2024 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM - The National Society of Leadership and Success’ Speaker Broadcast Series is holding this livestream “Supreme Insights” event featuring Supreme Court Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson. Attend to discover the principles of leadership, fairness and the responsibilities that come with holding one of the most significant roles in the judiciary.
item.author: Students

item.title: “Reimagining History: The Artistic Vision and Storytelling of ‘I Dream’” Discussion Scheduled for October 23
item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 23, 2024 1:00 PM - 2:30 PM - Douglas Tappin, author and composer of “I Dream,” will discuss his vision and storytelling in advance of its concert performance on November 1.
item.author: Community

item.title: Field Trip to ISC2 Capital District Chapter Meeting in West Point Slated for October 23
item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 23, 2024 (all day) - Join the Rensselaer Cybersecurity Collaboratory and DotCIO for this field trip to the ISC2 Meeting at US Military Academy in West Point, NY, featuring a presentation by RPI alum Col. Chris Morrell, Cyber Program Director at USMA. Bus will leave at 7AM from the Union; lunch will be available for purchase for $15. Email Dr. Brian Callahan to RSVP!
item.author: Community

item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Continue Graduate Certificate Review Sessions October 23
item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 23, 2024 3:00 PM - 3:30 PM - Join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., for this information session highlighting the whole range of Rensselaer’s online, project-based graduate certificate programs. Three courses in length and able to be completed in as little as seven months, the certificates can add up to a customized, career-aligned master’s degree. Please register if you plan to attend.
item.author: Community

item.title: Auxiliary Services Posts Fall Dining Survey
item.description: All members of the campus community are invited to take a moment to complete the Fall 2024 Dining Customer Satisfaction Survey!
item.author: Community

item.title: Department of Chemistry Continues Seminar Series October 22
item.description: Date: Tuesday, October 22, 2024 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM - This week’s Chemistry seminar will be presented by Dr. Colin Smith, of the Department of Chemistry at Wesleyan University, who will speak on “Exploring Unexpected Terrain in Protein Energy Landscapes.”
item.author: Community

item.title: 2024 Faculty and Staff Benefits Expo - Friday, November 1
item.description: The Division of Human Recourses invites you to attend the 2024 Faculty and Staff Benefits Expo on Friday, November 1, 2024. The event will take place in the East Campus Athletics Village (ECAV) from 10:30am-2:00pm.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Flu, COVID Vaccines Being Offered to Faculty and Staff
item.description: In partnership with Rensselaer’s Division of Human Resources, Adirondack Health & Wellness is once again administering this year’s free flu and COVID-19 vaccine clinics for faculty and staff. Appointments are still available in October and November.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: TIAA Offering Confidential In-Person Retirement Counseling October 29
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, October 29, 2024 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement plan benefits!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
